info.name: NMC First run wizard
info.summary: NMC First run wizard for MagentaCLOUD
info.description: This contains links to the standard desktop client, Android app, and the iOS app. The window also shows a link for accessing MagentaCLOUD via WebDAV. The NMC First run wizard can be customized to meet specific design goals, or to change links and messages.
info.author: Kavita Sonawane
